org.sandag.popsyn.balancer
Class ConvergenceManager

java.lang.Object
  org.sandag.popsyn.balancer.ConvergenceManager

public class ConvergenceManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class records the convergence status after balancing each TAZ as well as the overall convergence statistics after all TAZs are balanced. The convergence status and performance statistics are printed out as a CSV file. The number of non-converged TAZs is recorded, along with the number of non-converged TAZs by control category.

add

public void add(ConvergenceStat stat)
Adds a ConvergenceStat object for a zone to cStats, the list of all ConvergenceStat objects. If the added object is converged, the number of non-converged zones is increased by 1.

Parameters:
stat -

setNonConvergedControlCounts

public void setNonConvergedControlCounts()
Counts the number of non-converged zones for each control category. The results are stored in the nonConvergedControlCounts HashMap.

initNonConvergedControlCounts

private void initNonConvergedControlCounts()
Initializes the HashMap that records the number of non-converged zones by control category. Each control category is initially given 0 non-converged zones.

printNonConvergedZones

public void printNonConvergedZones(Version version)
Outputs a CSV file containing the number of non-converged zones by control category.

Parameters:
version - the Version object for this PopSyn run so that the version ID can be appended to the file name

printBalanceDetails

public void printBalanceDetails(Version version)
Outputs a CSV file containing convergence details for each zone and control category. For each zone-control pair, the target value is shown next to the synthesized value. Whether the zone-control pair has converged is also shown.

Parameters:
version -

isInControlDefList

private boolean isInControlDefList(IControlDefinition<Household> def,
                                   java.util.List<IControlDefinition<Household>> defList)
Checks whether a particular control definition is in a list of control definitions

Parameters:
def - The specific control definition to check for
defList - The list of control definitions to search through
Returns:
Returns a boolean where true indicates that the control definition is in the list
